caption.p: The dependence of root (A), stem (B), and leaf (C) mass on population origin (light fill is native, dark fill is introduced). Each point is the means Â± SE of a population (abbreviations from Supplementary Table S1) in the July (triangle) or August (circle) time block. ** indicates P < 0.01 for the main effect of population origin (see Table 1 for full results). N = 4 except for population GL ( N = 8).
